name: Ensure Spring Boot MisConfiguration-Shutdown Actuator Endpoint is Enabled
description: Ensure to enable the Spring Boot Shutdown Actuator as it will allow users/attackers to shut down the application without authentication.
rationale:
This configuration flag Shutdown Actuator will allows authenticated users to shut down the application incidentally or intentionally or accidentally.
By default this feature is configured as a sensitive endpoint and therefore authentication is required to use this endpoint.

qualityStandards.name: Security Misconfiguration
qualityStandards.description: Security misconfiguration is the most commonly seen issue. This is commonly a result of insecure default configurations, incomplete or ad hoc configurations, open cloud storage, misconfigured HTTP headers, and verbose error messages containing sensitive information. Not only must all operating systems, frameworks, libraries, and applications be securely configured, but they must be patched/upgraded in a timely fashion.
